hypothesis_content.title: STRK Post-News Retest Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a >15% single-day surge on high volume (>150% of 20-day avg) driven by specific 'Altcoin Buzz' news, if STRK price pulls back to retest the breakout level (previous day's high) within 3 days and holds, a long entry will capture the next leg up.
hypothesis_content.rationale: STRK is cited in news leading altcoin buzz. A strong, high-volume surge establishes a new support level. A successful retest of that level confirms strength and attracts momentum followers for a second wave.
entry_conditions: STRK experiences a >15% daily gain on volume > 150% 20-day avg
Subsequent pullback within 72 hours retraces to within 2% of the breakout day's high
Price holds above this level for two consecutive 4h closes
Daily RSI remains above 50 during pullback

exit_conditions.take_profit: Target = Initial surge high + (0.5 * height of initial surge)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Break below the breakout day's low

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: The retest fails (price breaks below support), indicating the initial surge was a bull trap and not sustained buying interest.
